body.name: KLO Bluetooth Mouse for MacBook/MacBook air/Pro/iPad, Wireless Mouse for Laptop/Notebook/pc/iPad/Chromebook (Purple)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 5 mins
features: ✪✪3DPI SWITCH:Using high-performance optical chips, up to 1600 dpi(800, 1200, 1600) accurately tracking,to meet different needs.

✪✪Adopt bluetooth 3.0/5.2 technology,built-in durable 500mAh Lithium polymer rechargeable battery,high cycle life, The charging time is about 1.5-2.5 hours, lasting use time, the Auto Switch Off function will help you save energy as your bluetooth mouse will switch off when your PC is turned off or the receiver is disconnected. If you do not use the mouse for eight minutes, it will go to sleeping mode, you can press the any button to weak it up. energy saving and extremely low power consumption.
✪✪It is compatible with Mac OS Windows /Win8/10/and is suitable for desktop/ipad/notebook/Mac Macbook Pro/Air(2017/2018/2019/2020/2021) iMac and other devices.

✪✪contoured shape, Ultra Thin and lightweight design, smooth surface ensure maximum comfort and support for your hand even after long working hours, The rubber scroll wheel makes sure that your hand will not slip when scrolling,This bluetooth mouse can meet your demand of daily office working and personal preference.

✪✪To provide you with quality after-sales service: any quality problems within a month can be directly returned or replaced.It is recommended to use the USB port of the computer to charge the mouse, or use a 5V 1A charger, no larger than 5V 1A.
body.description: Adopt bluetooth 3.0/5.2 technology, built-in 500mAH A product lithium battery, configuration charging line, like a mobile phone, easy to charge, more scientific, charge and discharge of more than 500 times, the mouse no longer need to buy a battery. size: 113mm x 58mm x23mm weight : 3.2 oz package: Bluetooth mouse x1, USB Charging Cable x1 How to use Bluetooth wireless mouse:Apple Mac MacBook/pro/Air 2012/2013/2014/2015/2016/2017/2018/2019/2022: first, open the mouse switch, open the computer system preferences, open the bluetooth, when the computer Bluetooth display is searching for nearby Bluetooth devices, hold down the mouse button (at the bottom of the mouse small black button) and keep 3 to 8 seconds, and then your computer display the search bluetooth mouse, bluetooth device click on the link, and then the connection is successful Win7/8/10/XP series notebook computer usage instructions: First, open the mouse switch, open the computer settings, open the device Bluetooth function, open add Bluetooth, open Bluetooth, when the computer Bluetooth display is searching for nearby Bluetooth devices, hold down the mouse button (at the bottom of the mouse small black button) and keep 3 to 8 seconds, and then your computer display the search bluetooth mouse, bluetooth device click on the link, and then the connection is successful

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 31,452 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Double modes.. double value!
reviews.reviewText: Bluetooth is easy to use... no wires, adapters etc. I needed a bluetooth mouse: this thing fits the bill. Sometimes, for certain games...bluetooth always seems to lag a bit. This thing can instantly switch to the 'usb' receiver mode. The receiver dongle snaps invisibly into the bottom too. It's good design, and it's an excellent backup mode.I got the style with the fading RGB leds..just for a couple extra bucks. Overall this thing is responsive, it pairs quickly, and it just works great. Can't beat it... I'll probably buy one more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations!!
reviews.reviewText: I am so please with the purchase of this mouse! I didn't want to spend the big bucks and get an Apple mouse, so I researched all others available within this very economical range, and I am so happy to report that I'm thrilled with my choice and this mouse in every way. Easily charges during use (have only needed to charge once since receiving using it daily) and has perfect functionality. Synced right up with my Mac laptop on first try and has been working perfectly since. It does "fall asleep" kinda quickly, but simply click and it's back in action. It's not heavy duty, don't drop or abuse it, but for the price it was just what I needed!! Thank you Amazon for such a variety from which to choose instead of paying $70++ for Apple's.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Little bit cheap plastic, but works perfectly
reviews.reviewText: The PC mouse has been a reliable companion for the past 10 months. While it may not boast top-tier quality, its comfort level is exceptional for me. The lightweight design enhances usability, and the battery life is impressive. Overall, a solid choice, especially considering its comfortable feel and extended battery performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent price to value relationship
reviews.reviewText: Exceptional price to value relationship. Easy to use, easy to recharge, durable and long lasting. Liked the first one I purchased so much I now own and use one for each of my home/work laptops (total of three). Ideal size for home, work or travel. Lasts up to 48 hours on a single 3 hour charge with a USB-B cable. Hooks up to any computer with Bluetooth going as far back as a third generation Surface Pro 3, current generation is a Surface Pro 8. Also works with Chromebooks and even iPads (yes, you can sink a Bluetooth mouse with an Apple computer). Definite purchase opportunity. michaelpaul50

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It pairs with my macbook pro no problem. It feels great in my hand, and it is low profile. my only qualm is that it seems to take few seconds longer to "wake up" than I feel like it should. Overall though, its very nice and would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Loved the mouse until it broke after 2 months
reviews.reviewText: I really liked this affordable and sleek mouse for my WFH setup. It’s convenient that it works via Bluetooth instead of needing to plug in yet another thing. However, it has no indicator of charging status. Therefore, it went dead (after about 2 months, which is a great time length!) and even after several hours of proper charging it never came back to life. No lights and no connection to my computer anymore, so it is now nonfunctional. Seeing as it’s past the 30 day time window, there is no return or replacement option, which is disappointing given that even a cheap mouse should last more than a few months!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This mouse in incredible! Now I can right-click in Metatrader!
reviews.reviewText: At $13.26 after tax this mouse seems like a great deal. It works flawlessly with my Late 2013 Macbook Pro 13" Retina with High Sierra MacOS Version 10.13.6. When it first arrived I used it with the cord and just left it plugged in the laptop all day yesterday, today I'm using it without the cord and it's great. I'm getting ready to order a hard mousepad today.The reason I bought this mouse is because I use Metatrader 4 and Metatrader 5 and you can not right click just using the Macbook Trackpad. So even though I like my Macbook by itself just using the trackpad, there are a lot of functionalities that you can not access without an external mouse. Even though I bought my Mac back in February 3, 2014 I just now discovered a need for this mouse, but now having used a mouse with my Macbook I'll never look back, there's nothing like the convenience of using a great mouse that works great. It's a lot less work for my hands. I never noticed how hard my hands were working really until just now when I started thinking about how much easier using this mouse is. Anyway thank you so much. :)Note: I love the sleek design, light-weight, the fact that it's a lazer, the last mouse I used was an old-school rolly-polly mouse, haha. It's a bit slippery on this card-stock paper I'm using, but maybe getting a hard mouse-pad with some grippiness to it will help, because specifically when I'm using my computer in bed, the mouse is not on a level surface.So like I was saying, now I have full access to all the features of Metatrader by being able to right-click on stuff. (*see picture) This is likely to be the case on many Windows tools that have been adapted to run on Macs.UPDATE: The cursor seems to move, it drifts, is there any way to calibrate it so it does not drift? is there any software that can help with this? late 2013 macbook pro high sierra 10.13.6NEW UPDATE: The cursor no longer moves or drifts and works perfectly! Something I hadn't figured out before is that ALL YOU HAVE TO DO TO TURN THE MOUSE BACK ON IS CLICK THE MOUSE! Before I figured this out I was "re-pairing it" to the blue-tooth which was really so annoying. But now that I know how to properly use it it is amazing. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars lost charging capability
reviews.reviewText: Mouse worked fine for a few months. Then it stopped seeing the USB receiver and I had to switch it to Bluetooth. Six months later, the charging port failed and mouse will no longer work, even when plugged in. Have had it less than a year. I know it was inexpensive, but I'm still disappointed.
Ligero, cómodo, funciona excelente, suave al tacto y es resistente

reviews.reviewerName: É ótimo e parece realmente ser original. Não veio lacrado, mas acredito que seja para garantir o funcionamento.
reviews.reviewText: Muito fácil de conectar e muito bom. Bom custo benefício. A qualidade do material não é 100% mas parece que vai durar um bom tempo.

Buen material fácil de configurar, llega ya cargada la batería Perfecto funcionamiento para mac reconoce las funciones de cualquier Mouse de Mac, funciona mejor en mac que en Windows, Windows tarde para reconocerlo en Bluetooth.

reviews.reviewTitle: very bad product… not even worth a star
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First of all the delivery was late. Within a day the return window was closed and it is not connecting to my apple macpro
